content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":263452,"originalJapaneseLine":"オーソドックスな和姦絵","translatedEnglishLine":"A traditional consensual lovemaking illustration"},{"lineNumber":263453,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹はランスの事を好き好きなので幸せなエッチ","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki loves Rance dearly, so it's a happy lovemaking scene."},{"lineNumber":263454,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":263455,"originalJapaneseLine":"司令部、ランスの側にぴったりと美樹が付いている。","translatedEnglishLine":"At the headquarters, Miki is sticking closely by Rance's side."},{"lineNumber":263456,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王美樹ちゃんは俺の彼女だ、みんな手を出すなよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon King Miki-chan is my girlfriend, so everyone stay away."},{"lineNumber":263457,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎が、どうして・・と呆然としている","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentarou is dumbfounded, wondering why..."},{"lineNumber":263458,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィル、ミラクル、カロリアとかランスに近い子がどうなったの？と不思議がっている","translatedEnglishLine":"He’s wondering what happened to Seal, Miracle, Karoria, and those close to Rance."},{"lineNumber":263459,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにワーグが来て、あの説明しますと現れる（説明シーンは無しいいです）","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Warg appears saying, “I'll explain,” (but no explanation scene needed)."},{"lineNumber":263460,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle"},{"lineNumber":263461,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスとミラクル","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and Miracle"},{"lineNumber":263462,"originalJapaneseLine":"異界の話をしてから、美樹から逃げ回っているミラクル","translatedEnglishLine":"After talking about the other world, Miracle is running away from Miki."},{"lineNumber":263463,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうしてだとランスに聞かれる","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance asks why."},{"lineNumber":263464,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王の話を聞いた、彼らは異界から来たそうだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"She says she heard about the Demon King; they apparently came from another world."},{"lineNumber":263465,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは前に聞いていたが本気にしてなかったので、あれ本当だったのかと","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance had heard it before but didn’t take it seriously, thinking, “So that was true.”"},{"lineNumber":263466,"originalJapaneseLine":"たぶん本当だ、その異界を私は知っている。","translatedEnglishLine":"Probably true. I know that other world."},{"lineNumber":263467,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王はその元の異界に戻りたくて私に接触しようとしているのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"The Demon King wants to return to that original other world and is trying to contact me."},{"lineNumber":263468,"originalJapaneseLine":"そりゃ、元の世界に戻りたいだろうからな","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, it makes sense they want to go back to their original world."},{"lineNumber":263469,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様がまだ魔王美樹ちゃんの処女を奪っていないうちに返す訳にはいかない","translatedEnglishLine":"I can’t let her go back before I have taken Demon King Miki-chan’s virginity."},{"lineNumber":263470,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういう事で躊躇しているのだな、さすがミラクルだ、俺の女だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"So that’s why you’re hesitating. As expected of Miracle, she’s my woman."},{"lineNumber":263471,"originalJapaneseLine":"違う、そうでは無い","translatedEnglishLine":"No, that’s not it."},{"lineNumber":263472,"originalJapaneseLine":"その異界とはスチールホラーと私は呼んでいる恐ろしい場所なのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"That other world is a terrifying place I call Steel Horror."},{"lineNumber":263473,"originalJapaneseLine":"前の画像（前回のＣＧを流用）を出しながら説明、文明が違い過ぎる、私も逃げ帰った","translatedEnglishLine":"Showing a previous image (reusing last CG) while explaining: the civilization is too different; I also fled back."},{"lineNumber":263474,"originalJapaneseLine":"私が世界を急いで統一しないといけないと考えているのは","translatedEnglishLine":"The reason I think we must quickly unify the world is because"},{"lineNumber":263475,"originalJapaneseLine":"実はいずれスチールホラーからの侵略があるかもしれないと考えているからだ","translatedEnglishLine":"I believe there might one day be an invasion from Steel Horror."},{"lineNumber":263476,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは魔物軍より強い、世界が一致団結しても勝てるかどうか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"They are stronger than the demon army; even if the world unites, victory is uncertain..."},{"lineNumber":263477,"originalJapaneseLine":"とにかくあの世界は危険なのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, that world is dangerous."},{"lineNumber":263478,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":263479,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふむ・・しかし、それは使えるかもしれないぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... however, that might be useful."},{"lineNumber":263480,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前は人付き合いが下手だから戦いになったが、俺様は違う。","translatedEnglishLine":"You failed because you’re bad with people, but I’m different."},{"lineNumber":263481,"originalJapaneseLine":"異界スチールホラーに入り混み、この国の姫君をコマして俺の女に加え","translatedEnglishLine":"I will infiltrate the other world Steel Horror, win over this country’s princess and make her my woman."},{"lineNumber":263482,"originalJapaneseLine":"スチールホラーそのものを支配する事も可能だ。がはははは","translatedEnglishLine":"It might even be possible to control Steel Horror itself. Gahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":263483,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてスチールホラーの軍隊を配下に加えたら魔軍を蹴散らすのはたやすいかもしれない。","translatedEnglishLine":"If I add Steel Horror’s army under my command, scattering the demon army might be easy."},{"lineNumber":263484,"originalJapaneseLine":"おお、いいぞ。よし、まずは偵察に行こう","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, good. Alright, first let’s go for reconnaissance."},{"lineNumber":263485,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミラクルはそれでも反対するがランスの気持ちはもう変わらない","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle still objects, but Rance’s mind won’t change."},{"lineNumber":263486,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":">Choice"},{"lineNumber":263487,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞異界に行く","translatedEnglishLine":">Go to the other world"},{"lineNumber":263488,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の外","translatedEnglishLine":"Outside Rance Castle"},{"lineNumber":263489,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは異界に向こう選抜メンバーを集めた","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance gathered a select team to go to the other world."},{"lineNumber":263490,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんな何事、何事・・といいながら着いてくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone follows, saying 'What’s going on? What’s happening...?'"},{"lineNumber":263491,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎、美樹に、お前達は異界スチールホラーから来たそうだな","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentarou says to Miki: You two apparently came from the other world Steel Horror."},{"lineNumber":263492,"originalJapaneseLine":"スチールホラー？よく分からないけど、はい、別世界から来ました。帰りたい","translatedEnglishLine":"Steel Horror? I don’t really understand, but yes, we came from another world. We want to go home."},{"lineNumber":263493,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむ、このおねーさんが帰してくれるぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, this lady here will send you back."},{"lineNumber":263494,"originalJapaneseLine":"こら、わしは承諾していない、スチールホラーにはいきたくない。と行っても無視","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, I don't agree. I don’t want to go to Steel Horror, but I’m ignored."},{"lineNumber":263495,"originalJapaneseLine":"というわけで、美樹ちゃんを元の世界に帰してやるついでに俺達も向かって","translatedEnglishLine":"So, while sending Miki-chan back to her original world, we will also head there."},{"lineNumber":263496,"originalJapaneseLine":"親善外交をして異界を仲間にする。","translatedEnglishLine":"We will conduct goodwill diplomacy and make the other world an ally."},{"lineNumber":263497,"originalJapaneseLine":"いくぞー、ミラクル、さっさと異界ゲートを開け","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s go—Miracle, hurry up and open the gate to the other world."},{"lineNumber":263498,"originalJapaneseLine":"こちょこちょとかしてとにかく開かせる　異界ゲートオープン","translatedEnglishLine":"Tickled and fidgeted until it opened—Other World Gate opens."},{"lineNumber":263499,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうなってもしらんぞ。と投げやりなミラクル","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t care what happens now, says a resigned Miracle."},{"lineNumber":263500,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：大阪","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Osaka"},{"lineNumber":263501,"originalJapaneseLine":"現代日本に到着した．大阪．市街地の外れ","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived in modern Japan. Osaka. Outskirts of the city."},{"lineNumber":263502,"originalJapaneseLine":"初めての異界におどろく面々、ビルとか、鉄道とか・・飛行機とか・・（背景を元に","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone is surprised by the other world for the first time: buildings, trains... airplanes... (based on background)."},{"lineNumber":263503,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":263504,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんながじろじろとこっちを見ます、（コスプレかな・・と思われている）","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone stares at them (they’re thought to be cosplayers)."},{"lineNumber":263505,"originalJapaneseLine":"不良が喧嘩を売ってくる、コスプレマニアが生意気に可愛い子を連れているカモだと思った","translatedEnglishLine":"Delinquents pick fights, thinking the cosplay fanatics are cocky and with cute girls."},{"lineNumber":263506,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスにいちゃもんつけてくる、むかつくから一刀両断に斬り殺した。","translatedEnglishLine":"They bother Rance; annoyed, he slashes them down in one strike."},{"lineNumber":263507,"originalJapaneseLine":"不良の仲間がうわっ・・なんだ、こいつらと逃げて行く　","translatedEnglishLine":"The delinquents' friends are shocked and run away."},{"lineNumber":263508,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして周囲にいた一般人も逃げてランス達のまわりから人気がまったく無くなった","translatedEnglishLine":"Then the bystanders also fled, and the area around Rance and his group became deserted."},{"lineNumber":263509,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、なんと弱い奴らだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahaha, what weaklings they are."},{"lineNumber":263510,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ランス達にとっては日常だが、この世界では当然大事件になります。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is everyday life for Rance and the others but naturally a huge incident in this world."},{"lineNumber":263511,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　健太郎も美樹もすっかり殺伐とした日常になれて若干麻痺している。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentarou and Miki have become so accustomed to this brutal everyday life that they are somewhat numb."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーソドックスな和姦絵
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A traditional consensual lovemaking illustration

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹はランスの事を好き好きなので幸せなエッチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki loves Rance dearly, so it's a happy lovemaking scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司令部、ランスの側にぴったりと美樹が付いている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the headquarters, Miki is sticking closely by Rance's side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王美樹ちゃんは俺の彼女だ、みんな手を出すなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King Miki-chan is my girlfriend, so everyone stay away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎が、どうして・・と呆然としている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentarou is dumbfounded, wondering why...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、ミラクル、カロリアとかランスに近い子がどうなったの？と不思議がっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s wondering what happened to Seal, Miracle, Karoria, and those close to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにワーグが来て、あの説明しますと現れる（説明シーンは無しいいです）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Warg appears saying, “I'll explain,” (but no explanation scene needed).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとミラクル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Miracle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界の話をしてから、美樹から逃げ回っているミラクル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After talking about the other world, Miracle is running away from Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてだとランスに聞かれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance asks why.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の話を聞いた、彼らは異界から来たそうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She says she heard about the Demon King; they apparently came from another world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは前に聞いていたが本気にしてなかったので、あれ本当だったのかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance had heard it before but didn’t take it seriously, thinking, “So that was true.”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん本当だ、その異界を私は知っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably true. I know that other world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王はその元の異界に戻りたくて私に接触しようとしているのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King wants to return to that original other world and is trying to contact me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そりゃ、元の世界に戻りたいだろうからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it makes sense they want to go back to their original world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様がまだ魔王美樹ちゃんの処女を奪っていないうちに返す訳にはいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t let her go back before I have taken Demon King Miki-chan’s virginity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう事で躊躇しているのだな、さすがミラクルだ、俺の女だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that’s why you’re hesitating. As expected of Miracle, she’s my woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違う、そうでは無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, that’s not it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その異界とはスチールホラーと私は呼んでいる恐ろしい場所なのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That other world is a terrifying place I call Steel Horror.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前の画像（前回のＣＧを流用）を出しながら説明、文明が違い過ぎる、私も逃げ帰った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Showing a previous image (reusing last CG) while explaining: the civilization is too different; I also fled back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が世界を急いで統一しないといけないと考えているのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason I think we must quickly unify the world is because

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実はいずれスチールホラーからの侵略があるかもしれないと考えているからだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I believe there might one day be an invasion from Steel Horror.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは魔物軍より強い、世界が一致団結しても勝てるかどうか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are stronger than the demon army; even if the world unites, victory is uncertain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかくあの世界は危険なのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, that world is dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ・・しかし、それは使えるかもしれないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... however, that might be useful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前は人付き合いが下手だから戦いになったが、俺様は違う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You failed because you’re bad with people, but I’m different.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界スチールホラーに入り混み、この国の姫君をコマして俺の女に加え
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will infiltrate the other world Steel Horror, win over this country’s princess and make her my woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スチールホラーそのものを支配する事も可能だ。がはははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might even be possible to control Steel Horror itself. Gahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてスチールホラーの軍隊を配下に加えたら魔軍を蹴散らすのはたやすいかもしれない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I add Steel Horror’s army under my command, scattering the demon army might be easy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、いいぞ。よし、まずは偵察に行こう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, good. Alright, first let’s go for reconnaissance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルはそれでも反対するがランスの気持ちはもう変わらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle still objects, but Rance’s mind won’t change.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: >Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞異界に行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: >Go to the other world

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の外
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Outside Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは異界に向こう選抜メンバーを集めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance gathered a select team to go to the other world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな何事、何事・・といいながら着いてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone follows, saying 'What’s going on? What’s happening...?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎、美樹に、お前達は異界スチールホラーから来たそうだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentarou says to Miki: You two apparently came from the other world Steel Horror.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スチールホラー？よく分からないけど、はい、別世界から来ました。帰りたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Steel Horror? I don’t really understand, but yes, we came from another world. We want to go home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、このおねーさんが帰してくれるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, this lady here will send you back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こら、わしは承諾していない、スチールホラーにはいきたくない。と行っても無視
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, I don't agree. I don’t want to go to Steel Horror, but I’m ignored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というわけで、美樹ちゃんを元の世界に帰してやるついでに俺達も向かって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, while sending Miki-chan back to her original world, we will also head there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親善外交をして異界を仲間にする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will conduct goodwill diplomacy and make the other world an ally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくぞー、ミラクル、さっさと異界ゲートを開け
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s go—Miracle, hurry up and open the gate to the other world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちょこちょとかしてとにかく開かせる　異界ゲートオープン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tickled and fidgeted until it opened—Other World Gate opens.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうなってもしらんぞ。と投げやりなミラクル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t care what happens now, says a resigned Miracle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：大阪
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Osaka

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現代日本に到着した．大阪．市街地の外れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived in modern Japan. Osaka. Outskirts of the city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めての異界におどろく面々、ビルとか、鉄道とか・・飛行機とか・・（背景を元に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is surprised by the other world for the first time: buildings, trains... airplanes... (based on background).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんながじろじろとこっちを見ます、（コスプレかな・・と思われている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone stares at them (they’re thought to be cosplayers).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不良が喧嘩を売ってくる、コスプレマニアが生意気に可愛い子を連れているカモだと思った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Delinquents pick fights, thinking the cosplay fanatics are cocky and with cute girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスにいちゃもんつけてくる、むかつくから一刀両断に斬り殺した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They bother Rance; annoyed, he slashes them down in one strike.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不良の仲間がうわっ・・なんだ、こいつらと逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The delinquents' friends are shocked and run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして周囲にいた一般人も逃げてランス達のまわりから人気がまったく無くなった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the bystanders also fled, and the area around Rance and his group became deserted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、なんと弱い奴らだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahaha, what weaklings they are.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達にとっては日常だが、この世界では当然大事件になります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is everyday life for Rance and the others but naturally a huge incident in this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎も美樹もすっかり殺伐とした日常になれて若干麻痺している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentarou and Miki have become so accustomed to this brutal everyday life that they are somewhat numb.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

they apparently came from another world."},{"lineNumber":263465,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは前に聞いていたが本気にしてなかったので、あれ本当だったのかと","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance had heard it before but didn’t take it seriously, thinking, “So that was true.”"},{"lineNumber":263466,"originalJapaneseLine":"たぶん本当だ、その異界を私は知っている。","translatedEnglishLine":"Probably true. I know that other world."},{"lineNumber":263467,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王はその元の異界に戻りたくて私に接触しようとしているのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"The Demon King wants to return to that original other world and is trying to contact me."},{"lineNumber":263468,"originalJapaneseLine":"そりゃ、元の世界に戻りたいだろうからな","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, it makes sense they want to go back to their original world."},{"lineNumber":263469,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様がまだ魔王美樹ちゃんの処女を奪っていないうちに返す訳にはいかない","translatedEnglishLine":"I can’t let her go back before I have taken Demon King Miki-chan’s virginity."},{"lineNumber":263470,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういう事で躊躇しているのだな、さすがミラクルだ、俺の女だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"So that’s why you’re hesitating. Alright, first let’s go for reconnaissance."},{"lineNumber":263485,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミラクルはそれでも反対するがランスの気持ちはもう変わらない","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle still objects, but Rance’s mind won’t change."},{"lineNumber":263486,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":">Choice"},{"lineNumber":263487,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞異界に行く","translatedEnglishLine":">Go to the other world"},{"lineNumber":263488,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の外","translatedEnglishLine":"Outside Rance Castle"},{"lineNumber":263489,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは異界に向こう選抜メンバーを集めた","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance gathered a select team to go to the other world."},{"lineNumber":263490,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんな何事、何事・・といいながら着いてくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone follows, saying 'What’s going on? What’s happening...?'"},{"lineNumber":263491,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎、美樹に、お前達は異界スチールホラーから来たそうだな","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentarou says to Miki: You two apparently came from the other world Steel Horror."},{"lineNumber":263492,"originalJapaneseLine":"スチールホラー？よく分からないけど、はい、別世界から来ました。帰りたい","translatedEnglishLine":"Steel Horror? I don’t really understand, but yes, we came from another world. We want to go home."},{"lineNumber":263493,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむ、このおねーさんが帰してくれるぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, this lady here will send you back."},{"lineNumber":263494,"originalJapaneseLine":"こら、わしは承諾していない、スチールホラーにはいきたくない。と行っても無視","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, I don't agree. I don’t want to go to Steel Horror, but I’m ignored."},{"lineNumber":263495,"originalJapaneseLine":"というわけで、美樹ちゃんを元の世界に帰してやるついでに俺達も向かって","translatedEnglishLine":"So, while sending Miki-chan back to her original world, we will also head there."},{"lineNumber":263496,"originalJapaneseLine":"親善外交をして異界を仲間にする。","translatedEnglishLine":"We will conduct goodwill diplomacy and make the other world an ally."},{"lineNumber":263497,"originalJapaneseLine":"いくぞー、ミラクル、さっさと異界ゲートを開け","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s go—Miracle, hurry up and open the gate to the other world."},{"lineNumber":263498,"originalJapaneseLine":"こちょこちょとかしてとにかく開かせる　異界ゲートオープン","translatedEnglishLine":"Tickled and fidgeted until it opened—Other World Gate opens."},{"lineNumber":263499,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうなってもしらんぞ。と投げやりなミラクル","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t care what happens now, says a resigned Miracle."},{"lineNumber":263500,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：大阪","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Osaka"},{"lineNumber":263501,"originalJapaneseLine":"現代日本に到着した．大阪．市街地の外れ","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived in modern Japan. Osaka. Outskirts of the city."},{"lineNumber":263502,"originalJapaneseLine":"初めての異界におどろく面々、ビルとか、鉄道とか・・飛行機とか・・（背景を元に","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone is surprised by the other world for the first time: buildings, trains... airplanes... (based on background)."},{"lineNumber":263503,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":263504,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんながじろじろとこっちを見ます、（コスプレかな・・と思われている）","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone stares at them (they’re thought to be cosplayers)."},{"lineNumber":263505,"originalJapaneseLine":"不良が喧嘩を売ってくる、コスプレマニアが生意気に可愛い子を連れているカモだと思った","translatedEnglishLine":"Delinquents pick fights, thinking the cosplay fanatics are cocky and with cute girls."},{"lineNumber":263506,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスにいちゃもんつけてくる、むかつくから一刀両断に斬り殺した。","translatedEnglishLine":"They bother Rance; annoyed, he slashes them down in one strike."},{"lineNumber":263507,"originalJapaneseLine":"不良の仲間がうわっ・・なんだ、こいつらと逃げて行く　","translatedEnglishLine":"The delinquents' friends are shocked and run away."},{"lineNumber":263508,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして周囲にいた一般人も逃げてランス達のまわりから人気がまったく無くなった","translatedEnglishLine":"Then the bystanders also fled, and the area around Rance and his group became deserted."},{"lineNumber":263509,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、なんと弱い奴らだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahaha, what weaklings they are."},{"lineNumber":263510,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ランス達にとっては日常だが、この世界では当然大事件になります。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is everyday life for Rance and the others but naturally a huge incident in this world."},{"lineNumber":263511,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　健太郎も美樹もすっかり殺伐とした日常になれて若干麻痺している。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentarou and Miki have become so accustomed to this brutal everyday life that they are somewhat numb."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーソドックスな和姦絵
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A traditional consensual lovemaking illustration

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹はランスの事を好き好きなので幸せなエッチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki loves Rance dearly, so it's a happy lovemaking scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司令部、ランスの側にぴったりと美樹が付いている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the headquarters, Miki is sticking closely by Rance's side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王美樹ちゃんは俺の彼女だ、みんな手を出すなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King Miki-chan is my girlfriend, so everyone stay away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎が、どうして・・と呆然としている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentarou is dumbfounded, wondering why...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、ミラクル、カロリアとかランスに近い子がどうなったの？と不思議がっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s wondering what happened to Seal, Miracle, Karoria, and those close to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにワーグが来て、あの説明しますと現れる（説明シーンは無しいいです）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Warg appears saying, “I'll explain,” (but no explanation scene needed).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとミラクル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Miracle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界の話をしてから、美樹から逃げ回っているミラクル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After talking about the other world, Miracle is running away from Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてだとランスに聞かれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance asks why.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の話を聞いた、彼らは異界から来たそうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She says she heard about the Demon King; they apparently came from another world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは前に聞いていたが本気にしてなかったので、あれ本当だったのかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance had heard it before but didn’t take it seriously, thinking, “So that was true.”

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん本当だ、その異界を私は知っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably true. I know that other world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王はその元の異界に戻りたくて私に接触しようとしているのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King wants to return to that original other world and is trying to contact me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そりゃ、元の世界に戻りたいだろうからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it makes sense they want to go back to their original world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様がまだ魔王美樹ちゃんの処女を奪っていないうちに返す訳にはいかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t let her go back before I have taken Demon King Miki-chan’s virginity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう事で躊躇しているのだな、さすがミラクルだ、俺の女だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that’s why you’re hesitating. As expected of Miracle, she’s my woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違う、そうでは無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, that’s not it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その異界とはスチールホラーと私は呼んでいる恐ろしい場所なのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That other world is a terrifying place I call Steel Horror.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前の画像（前回のＣＧを流用）を出しながら説明、文明が違い過ぎる、私も逃げ帰った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Showing a previous image (reusing last CG) while explaining: the civilization is too different; I also fled back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が世界を急いで統一しないといけないと考えているのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason I think we must quickly unify the world is because

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実はいずれスチールホラーからの侵略があるかもしれないと考えているからだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I believe there might one day be an invasion from Steel Horror.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは魔物軍より強い、世界が一致団結しても勝てるかどうか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are stronger than the demon army; even if the world unites, victory is uncertain...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかくあの世界は危険なのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, that world is dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ・・しかし、それは使えるかもしれないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... however, that might be useful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前は人付き合いが下手だから戦いになったが、俺様は違う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You failed because you’re bad with people, but I’m different.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異界スチールホラーに入り混み、この国の姫君をコマして俺の女に加え
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will infiltrate the other world Steel Horror, win over this country’s princess and make her my woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スチールホラーそのものを支配する事も可能だ。がはははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might even be possible to control Steel Horror itself. Gahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてスチールホラーの軍隊を配下に加えたら魔軍を蹴散らすのはたやすいかもしれない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I add Steel Horror’s army under my command, scattering the demon army might be easy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、いいぞ。よし、まずは偵察に行こう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, good. Alright, first let’s go for reconnaissance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルはそれでも反対するがランスの気持ちはもう変わらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle still objects, but Rance’s mind won’t change.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: >Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞異界に行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: >Go to the other world

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の外
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Outside Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは異界に向こう選抜メンバーを集めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance gathered a select team to go to the other world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな何事、何事・・といいながら着いてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone follows, saying 'What’s going on? What’s happening...?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎、美樹に、お前達は異界スチールホラーから来たそうだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentarou says to Miki: You two apparently came from the other world Steel Horror.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スチールホラー？よく分からないけど、はい、別世界から来ました。帰りたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Steel Horror? I don’t really understand, but yes, we came from another world. We want to go home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、このおねーさんが帰してくれるぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, this lady here will send you back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こら、わしは承諾していない、スチールホラーにはいきたくない。と行っても無視
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, I don't agree. I don’t want to go to Steel Horror, but I’m ignored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というわけで、美樹ちゃんを元の世界に帰してやるついでに俺達も向かって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, while sending Miki-chan back to her original world, we will also head there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親善外交をして異界を仲間にする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will conduct goodwill diplomacy and make the other world an ally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくぞー、ミラクル、さっさと異界ゲートを開け
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s go—Miracle, hurry up and open the gate to the other world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちょこちょとかしてとにかく開かせる　異界ゲートオープン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tickled and fidgeted until it opened—Other World Gate opens.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうなってもしらんぞ。と投げやりなミラクル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t care what happens now, says a resigned Miracle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：大阪
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Osaka

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現代日本に到着した．大阪．市街地の外れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived in modern Japan. Osaka. Outskirts of the city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めての異界におどろく面々、ビルとか、鉄道とか・・飛行機とか・・（背景を元に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is surprised by the other world for the first time: buildings, trains... airplanes... (based on background).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんながじろじろとこっちを見ます、（コスプレかな・・と思われている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone stares at them (they’re thought to be cosplayers).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不良が喧嘩を売ってくる、コスプレマニアが生意気に可愛い子を連れているカモだと思った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Delinquents pick fights, thinking the cosplay fanatics are cocky and with cute girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスにいちゃもんつけてくる、むかつくから一刀両断に斬り殺した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They bother Rance; annoyed, he slashes them down in one strike.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不良の仲間がうわっ・・なんだ、こいつらと逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The delinquents' friends are shocked and run away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして周囲にいた一般人も逃げてランス達のまわりから人気がまったく無くなった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the bystanders also fled, and the area around Rance and his group became deserted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、なんと弱い奴らだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahaha, what weaklings they are.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達にとっては日常だが、この世界では当然大事件になります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is everyday life for Rance and the others but naturally a huge incident in this world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎も美樹もすっかり殺伐とした日常になれて若干麻痺している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentarou and Miki have become so accustomed to this brutal everyday life that they are somewhat numb.
